overview: Dov Cohn joins PocketGear as Vice President, Products and Marketing. Dov most recently served as VP of Marketing and Product Management at Zoove, a mobile direct response marketing network based in Palo Alto, CA. From 2000 to 2007, Dov was VP, Product Management and Marketing at Motricity, where he led the design and delivery of the Fuel Mobile Application Platform, which has since delivered over $3 billion of mobile content. Dov’s deep product management and marketing background, including 10 years of experience in the mobile content industry, make him well suited to his role at PocketGear where he is responsible for corporate marketing, and product strategy and planning.

relationships.title: Sr. Vice President, Products and Marketing
VP of Marketing and Product Management
